name: IMMA FUCKING SQUARE!
description:
Here is my piece for the Jam Paint 2021, the theme was Campbell's Soup by Andy Warhol. I used Paint and Scratch.

___
I took up some challenges:

  • Make all your own sound effects using only sounds you can make with your mouth. Onomatopoeia recommended. (Well, to be honest I did only one sound).
  • Only use the default MS Paint color palette.
  • Draw your assets without a drawing tablet.
  • No transparencies.

___

It's a little adventure about a Square who wants to become a Circle, to fit into a Campbell's Soup. But don't forget, you aren't an industrial Square. And you have the power of being a drawing...

___

To move, use the arrows and then... follow the instructions in the game :)
